events.message: I am submitting a claim for the recent car accident I was involved in last night. The vehicle sustained front bumper and headlight damage.
The claim has been categorised under 'Auto Accident' after reviewing the accident report and initial documentation provided by the customer.
An agent specialized in vehicle accident claims was assigned to handle the case and contact the claimant for further details.
The claimant was contacted and their claim was acknowledged promptly, providing reassurance that the case is being processed.
We requested copies of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates from the claimant to support the claim.
Received all requested documents including the official police report and photos clearly showing the extent of damage to the vehicle.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence, assessing fault determination and verifying insurance policy coverage limits.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the claimant was not at fault and the damage assessment matches the reported accident.
A settlement offer reflecting full repair costs minus deductible has been proposed to the claimant for approval.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the clear communication throughout the claims process.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager following acceptance of settlement terms by the claimant.
Payment for the agreed settlement amount has been issued and sent to the claimantâ€™s bank account successfully.
The claim file has been closed after payment issuance and confirmation of receipt and satisfaction from the customer.
All documentation and case files have been archived electronically for future reference in compliance with company policy.
